reference_a:
@article{hawks2023,
  title = {Accurate prediction of momentary cognition from intensive longitudinal data},
  author = {Hawks, Zoë W. and Strong, Roger and Jung, Laneé and Beck, Emorie D. and Passell, Eliza J. and Grinspoon, Elizabeth and Singh, Shifali and Frumkin, Madelyn R. and Sliwinski, Martin and Germine, Laura T.},
  date = {2023-08-01},
  journaltitle = {Biological Psychiatry: Cognitive Neuroscience and Neuroimaging},
  series = {Reliability of {{Neurocognitive Measures}} for {{Mental Health}}},
  volume = {8},
  number = {8},
  pages = {841--851},
  doi = {10.1016/j.bpsc.2022.12.002}
}

features.name: day
features.coding: Days elapsed in study

features.name: interruptions
features.description:
Did anything interrupt
you during this
assessment?
features.coding:
0 = no
1 = yes
features.labels:
0 = no
1 = yes

features.name: argument_stress
features.coding:

If yes, how stressul was this experience?

2 = not at all stressful
3 = a little bit stressful
4 = somewhat stressful
5 = very stressful

Since the last survey, did you have an argument or disagreement with someone?

features.name: alert_sleepiness
features.coding:
Please indicate your sleepiness during the 5 minutes before this
survey by choosing the appropriate description.

1 = extemely alert
9 = very sleepy, great effort to keep awake, fighting sleep
features.wording:

survey by choosing the appropriate description.
features.labels:
1 = extemely alert
9 = very sleepy, great effort to keep awake, fighting sleep

5 = extreme difficulty

5 = extreme difficulty

1 = not having difficulty at all
5 = extreme difficulty

features.labels:

5 = extreme difficulty

features.name: study_time
features.coding: 24 hour clock in local time zone
features.wording: 24 hour clock in local time zone

features.name: sleep_duration
features.coding: Time between typical bed and wake up time
features.wording: Time between typical bed and wake up time

features.name: social_functioning_composite
features.coding: Mean of three social functioning items on a 0-7 scale
features.wording: Mean of three social functioning items on a 0-7 scale

features.name: ds_median_r_tc
features.coding: Median reaction time on correct responses
features.wording: Median reaction time on correct responses of Digit-Symbol Matching

features.name: crt_median_r_tc
features.coding: Median reaction time on correct responses
features.wording: Median reaction time on correct responses for Choice Reaction Time (CRT)

features.name: gcpt_dprime
features.coding: Accuracy computed as d-prime
features.wording: Accuracy computed as d-prime for Gradual Onset Continuous Performance Test (GCPT)

features.name: mot_percent_correct
features.coding: Proportion of correct targets
features.wording: Proportion of correct targets in Multiple Object Tracking (MOT) task
